subtitle: A tasty and filling soup.

method.text: Gently heat the oil and butter in a pan. Add the onion. Cook until softened but not browned.
Add the potatoes, celery and carrots. Stir well. Cover and cook on a low heat until the butter and oil are absorbed.
Pour in the stock, milk and seasoning. Bring to the boil then cover and simmer for 15 min or until potatoes are tender.
Cut the cheese into small pieces and stir into the soup with the parsley. Adjust the seasoning and serve.

title: Onion, potato and blue cheese soup
